headline: eBay Policy Shifts And Sustainability Moves Shape Valuation Opportunity
summary: eBay (NasdaqGS:EBAY) changed its Promoted Listings ad attribution policies in the US and Canada, leading to higher ad fees for many sellers and pushback over how sales are now credited to ads. The company updated its rules to restrict third party AI agents and unauthorized bots on the platform, focusing on marketplace integrity and user trust. eBay outlined a climate transition plan targeting net zero emissions by 2045 and expanded its Circular Fashion Fund to support reuse and resale in...
